message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think you'd find it very valuable. I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can offer you $120 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $140.  I believe this product will really benefit you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product. Let me know what you think.
